scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd -
scripts.server-dev: npm run build && docker build -t memory . && docker run --env-file ./env.list -p 3000:3000 -p 8000-9000:8000-9000 memory
scripts.server: npm run build && docker build -t memory . && docker run -d --env-file ./env.list -p 80:3000 -p 8000-9000:8000-9000 memory
scripts.pm: npm run build && pm2 start npm -- start
